title: Just a Closer Walk with Thee

tokens.lyric: I am weak, but Thou art strong.

lines.raw: [A]I am weak, but Thou art strong.

tokens.lyric: Father, keep me from all wrong.
I'll be satisfied as long as I walk,

lines.raw: [A]I'll be satisfied as long as I walk,

tokens.lyric: Please let me walk close to Thee

lines.raw: [A7]Please let me walk close to Thee

tokens.lyric: Just a closer walk with Thee
Grant it, Jesus, this my plea;
Let it be, dear Lord, let it be.

lines.raw: [E7]Let it be, dear Lord, let it be.

tokens.lyric: When my feeble life is o'er;
And time, for me, won't be no more.

lines.raw: [E7]And time, for me, won't be no more.

tokens.lyric: Won't you guide me, guide me o'er,

lines.raw: [A]Won't you guide me, guide me o'er,

tokens.lyric: To Thy Kingdom on that shore?
